data.text: @HockeyStatMiner If the Rangers do a good job with the next few days, they could be set up very well for years to come. They are on the way to a very good, young core. Goaltending should be solid for years to come.  Only need a new coaching staff that will utilize the strengths of these players.

@TrevorKempner Shestyorkin not scheduled to come over until Summer 2019 at the earliest (when his KHL deal expires). Pavelec UFA, Huska still in NCAA... so backup role wide open for the immediate future, at least.
@HockeyStatMiner No doubt, I guess staying fairly optimistic is important. I didn’t think a tank would sting this much haha
@theslopdog69 I mean there's mixed feelings about tanking and it's less exciting game-to-game to watch knowing your team is 100% not winning the Cup this spring
@HockeyStatMiner Do you think there’s fans that are turning their back on their team because of this tragic season
@HockeyStatMiner May be but half of the peeps don't know hanks not in net
@HockeyStatMiner Do you think #NYR fans are keeping an open mind about the rebuild? Or is there a majority who is giving up on this franchise?
